sentences.en: "Fourteen minutes," Chris said, taking a peep at his watch.
sentences.cn: “14分钟,”克里斯瞥了一眼他的手表说道.

sentences.en: Diana is taking the opportunity to wrap up the family presents.
sentences.cn: 黛安娜利用这个机会将家人的礼物包起来。

sentences.en: Employers may become overly cautious about taking on new staff.
sentences.cn: 雇主在雇用新职员时可能会变得过于谨慎。

sentences.en: Gerome tried to talk her into taking an apartment in Paris.
sentences.cn: 杰罗姆试图说服她在巴黎买一套公寓。

sentences.en: I don't like taking my kit off on screen.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢在银幕上表演裸戏。

sentences.en: Increasingly, more wine-makers are taking up the challenge of growing Pinot Noir.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的酿酒商开始接受种植黑皮诺葡萄的挑战。

sentences.en: Martin was thinking of taking legal action against Zuckerman.
sentences.cn: 马丁在考虑对朱克曼提起诉讼。

sentences.en: People were talking to him, listening to him, taking him places.
sentences.cn: 人们和他交谈、听他讲话、带他游览。

sentences.en: She spends her Easter holidays taking groups of children to France.
sentences.cn: 她带领一群孩子去法国过复活节。

sentences.en: She was taking uppers and downers at the time.
sentences.cn: 她那时在服用兴奋剂和抑制剂。

sentences.en: Sixteen teams are taking part, divided into four groups.
Taking my son Peter to a restaurant was a nightmare.
sentences.cn: 带我儿子彼得外出吃饭简直糟糕透了。

sentences.en: The army must be seen to be taking firm action.
sentences.cn: 军队必须采取坚决行动。

sentences.en: the fourth game was Wright's for the taking.
sentences.cn: 第四场比赛对赖特来说犹如探囊取物。

sentences.en: We're taking relatively benign medicines and we're turning them into poisons.
sentences.cn: 我们服的药相对来说药性温和，但是我们却在把它们变成毒药。

sentences.en: You're taking a big risk showing this to Kravis.
sentences.cn: 你把这个给克拉维斯看会有很大的风险。

words.tran_cn: 接受者；接受打赌的人；捕获者
可爱的；迷人的；会传染的

trans.tran_cn: 迷人的，引人注目的，会传染的
引人注目，迷人，取得，营业收入
拿（ take的现在分词 ），接受，取得，学习
